m_szDocTitle: Hydrogen-powered Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell costs £53,000 by CAR Magazine
m_szDocSumamry: ► Hyundai ix35 Fuel Cell prices announced ► Mass-produced hydrogen powered car ► On sale now, price could be subsidised further Prices have been announced today for Hyundai’s hydrogen fuel cell-powered ix35. Vaunted as the first mass-produced fuel cell vehicle to go on mainstream sale, it costs £53,105. That figure’s helped by part-funding from the European HyFive project, a hydrogen fuel consortium of which Hyundai’s a member, which cuts around £15,000 from the price.
